data.message:
Facebook!! 
 Messenger sucks I want to chat on Facebook like it was in the beginning I've had to uninstall messenger cause it doesn't work & takes up too much space on phone! NOT HAPPY!!!!:-/

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Chrissie. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Let us know what would make your experience more enjoyable at our feedback page: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Hailey

Facebook, you're pretending you don't know that MILLIONS of people are unhappy about not having messenger on the Facebook App? You must not read your reviews on the Play Store. You should read those. They are enough to let you know that nobody is happy with it. And if you're truly working hard to improve everyone's Facebook experience, messages would be back on the Facebook app.

You also deleted my comments regarding this issue. So that tells me that you're ignoring this messenger issue. That's obvious anyway with all the negative reviews regarding messenger and how badly it sucks. It's not like messenger costs money. What benefit does Facebook have forcing this download?
